content.raw:
I got it all to work, including my code (!), using only ROS transforms to the upperNeckPitchLink:

```
#!text

Answer 2: Color:    answer                         [0.0000 0.0000 1.0000]
                    ground truth                   [0.0000 0.0000 1.0000]
                    euclidean error                [0.000000]
          Position: answer                         [2.6336 0.3845 -0.6349]
                    ground truth (neck)            [2.6364 0.3920 -0.6322]
                    ground truth (head)            [2.5242 -0.3920 0.3814]
                    ground truth (head flipped)    [2.5242 0.3920 -0.3814]
                    euclidean error (neck)         [0.008420]
                    euclidean error (head)         [1.283651]
                    euclidean error (head flipped) [0.276247]
Answer 3: Color:    answer                         [1.0000 0.0000 0.0000]
                    ground truth                   [1.0000 0.0000 0.0000]
                    euclidean error                [0.000000]
          Position: answer                         [2.7539 0.4688 -0.6165]
                    ground truth (neck)            [2.7070 0.4636 -0.6020]
                    ground truth (head)            [2.5902 -0.4636 0.3422]
                    ground truth (head flipped)    [2.5902 0.4636 -0.3422]
                    euclidean error (neck)         [0.049369]
                    euclidean error (head)         [1.347352]
                    euclidean error (head flipped) [0.319424]


--------------------------------
Duration: 49.423000000
Total color euclidean error:                   0.000000
Total position euclidean error (neck):         6.044687
Total position euclidean error (head):         24.520527
Total position euclidean error (head flipped): 9.790409
```
Got a glitch with seeing some red lights that cropped up recently. Otherwise the duration would be a lot less. I'll try it with the head transform Friday.
